title: The Look: April’s Best-Dressed List
excerpt: Here are the best-dressed celebrities of the month, including Paige DeSorbo, Dua Lipa, Jennie, Aimee Lou Wood, Rihanna, and more.
text: Dua LipaJamie McCarthyWhen: April 28Where: The Chaplin Award Gala in New York City What: Schiaparelli Why: Now that’s what I call statement jewelry. Florence Pugh Credit: gotpap/Bauer-GriffinWhen: April 28Where: Los Angeles What: An Aupen bag and Kinraden earrings Why: One day she’s Amy March in Little Women, and the next she’s dressed to kill in all leather. Get you a girl who can do both. Serena Williams TheStewartofNY//Getty ImagesWhen: April 24Where: The 2025 Time100 Gala at Lincoln Center in New York City What: De Beers jewelry Why: I clicked for the necklace, but stayed for the dress. Okay, Serena! Minka Kelly When: April 22 Where: New York City What: A Simkhai dress Why: I can personally vouch that Minka Kelly is one of the sweetest stars in Hollywood—and she definitely looks the part in this charming layered dress.Nara Smith When: April 22Where: New York City What: A Savette bag and Tabayer earrings Why: It’s safe to assume that she did not make this look from scratch, but I’d never rule it out.Jennie Getty ImagesWhen: April 21Where: Coachella What: Custom and archival Mugler Why: This look says, “I’m that bitch.” And she is. Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowKristen Noel CrawleyDarian DiCianno/BFA.comWhen: April 16 Where: The Gucci Together Mother’s Day luncheon at Borgo in New York City What: Gucci Why: As you can imagine, it’s difficult to pick one best-dressed guest from a Gucci party, but I think Crawley’s tonal ensemble takes the cake.ZendayaCredit: Courtesy of Guest In Residence When: April 14Where: The School of Style Headquarters in Los Angeles What: A Guest In Residence cashmere polo Why: Celebs supporting celebs.Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowCourtney EatonAcne StudiosWhen: April 10 Where: A Yellowjackets event in Los Angeles What: Acne Studios Why: Just when I thought bows had slipped out of the trend cycle!Peggy GouJenny ArrowsmithWhen: April 8Where: Her collaboration launch with Don Julio 1942 Tequila in London What: A Danz suede set Why: In case it isn’t obvious from this outfit, Peggy Gou is the coolest of the cool. Laura Harrier Credit: Driggzy / BackgridWhen: April 7Where: Los Angeles, California What: A Coach bag Why: If you’ve been following these lists for some time, you’ll know how happy I am to see Laura Harrier back in the ranks. This is expert-level mixing of black and brown. Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowRihanna Courtesy of CelineWhen: April 6Where: Los Angeles, California What: Celine jeansWhy: First Kendrick Lamar wore Celine jeans, and now Rihanna followed suit. Gwyneth Paltrow Lester Cohen//Getty ImagesWhen: April 5Where: The Breakthrough Prize Ceremony in Los AngelesWhat: An archival Donna Karan resort 2015 dressWhy: Ethereal yet understated.
html:
Dua Lipa

When: April 28

Where: The Chaplin Award Gala in New York City

What: Schiaparelli

Why: Now that’s what I call statement jewelry.

Florence Pugh

When: April 28

Where: Los Angeles

What: An Aupen bag and Kinraden earrings

Why: One day she’s Amy March in Little Women, and the next she’s dressed to kill in all leather. Get you a girl who can do both.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Quinta Brunson

When: April 25

Where: Tiffany & Co.’s launch of Blue Book 2025: Sea of Wonder at The Metropolitan Museum of Art in New York City

What: A Jenny Packham dress and Tiffany & Co. jewelry

Why: She looks so pretty!

Lori Harvey

When: April 24

Where: Jacquemus’s Los Angeles boutique opening cocktail on Melrose Avenue

What: Jacquemus

Why: Take note, office sirens—this is how it’s really done.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Olivia Rodrigo

When: April 24

Where: The Planned Parenthood Gala at Cipriani South Street in New York City

What: Jewelry from Maison H and Anita Ko

Why: She swapped out her combat boots for the night.

Serena Williams

When: April 24

Where: The 2025 Time100 Gala at Lincoln Center in New York City

What: De Beers jewelry

Why: I clicked for the necklace, but stayed for the dress. Okay, Serena!

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Miley Cyrus

When: April 23

Where: New York City

What: A Coperni dress and Giuseppe Zanotti heels

Why: Miley has been serving up a series of all-black looks, each one more stunning than the last.

Minka Kelly

When: April 22

Where: New York City

What: A Simkhai dress

Why: I can personally vouch that Minka Kelly is one of the sweetest stars in Hollywood—and she definitely looks the part in this charming layered dress.

Nara Smith

When: April 22

Where: New York City

What: A Savette bag and Tabayer earrings

Why: It’s safe to assume that she did not make this look from scratch, but I’d never rule it out.

Jennie

When: April 21

Where: Coachella

What: Custom and archival Mugler

Why: This look says, “I’m that bitch.” And she is.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Katie Holmes

When: April 19

Where: New York City

What: A Selvi skirt and Metier bag

Why: Forever in awe of her permanent effortlessness.

JoAni Johnson

When: April 16

Where: FoundRae’s United in Love cocktail party in New York City

What: FoundRae jewelry and a Telfar bag

Why: New fashion hero unlocked.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Kristen Noel Crawley

When: April 16

Where: The Gucci Together Mother’s Day luncheon at Borgo in New York City

What: Gucci

Why: As you can imagine, it’s difficult to pick one best-dressed guest from a Gucci party, but I think Crawley’s tonal ensemble takes the cake.

Zendaya

When: April 14

Where: The School of Style Headquarters in Los Angeles

What: A Guest In Residence cashmere polo

Why: Celebs supporting celebs.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Courtney Eaton

When: April 10

Where: A Yellowjackets event in Los Angeles

What: Acne Studios

Why: Just when I thought bows had slipped out of the trend cycle!

Peggy Gou

When: April 8

Where: Her collaboration launch with Don Julio 1942 Tequila in London

What: A Danz suede set

Why: In case it isn’t obvious from this outfit, Peggy Gou is the coolest of the cool.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Paige DeSorbo

When: April 8

Where: New York City

What: Carolina Herrera

Why: I’ve always preferred checkered print over houndstooth, but even I’m loving this one.

Laura Harrier

When: April 7

Where: Los Angeles, California

What: A Coach bag

Why: If you’ve been following these lists for some time, you’ll know how happy I am to see Laura Harrier back in the ranks. This is expert-level mixing of black and brown.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Rihanna

When: April 6

Where: Los Angeles, California

What: Celine jeans

Why: First Kendrick Lamar wore Celine jeans, and now Rihanna followed suit.

Gwyneth Paltrow

When: April 5

Where: The Breakthrough Prize Ceremony in Los Angeles

What: An archival Donna Karan resort 2015 dress

Why: Ethereal yet understated.
